subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: When he was summoned from the substitute's bench on Wednesday, Filippo Inzaghi's team was losing in the Champions League to Real Madrid. He scored not once, but twice, in the span of 10 minutes.
snippet: When he was summoned from the substitute's bench on Wednesday, Filippo Inzaghi's team was losing in the Champions League to Real Madrid. He scored not once, but twice, in the span of 10 minutes.
